header.name: {actorName} leveled up to {targetLevel}!
header.description: Here's an overview of your new features. Please make selections where prompted!

notes.featsPrereq: Feats with prerequisites are marked with an asterisk (*)

attributeBoosts.label: Select four different Attributes to boost:

confirmDialog.title: Confirm Changes
confirmDialog.content: Are you sure you want to apply these level-up changes?

showButton.name: Enable Level-Up Button
showButton.hint: Choose whether to show a Level-Up button on character sheets. When disabled, the Level-Up Wizard will activate automatically after manually updating a character's level.

buttonPlacement.name: Level-Up Button Placement
buttonPlacement.hint: Select where the Level-Up button appears: either next to the character's level or in the toolbar at the top of the character sheet.

sortMethod.name: Feat Sorting Method
sortMethod.hint: Choose how feats should be sorted in dropdowns: by level or alphabetically.

featPrereqs.name: Display Feat Prerequisites
featPrereqs.hint: Toggle whether an asterisk (*) appears next to Feats with prerequisites in dropdowns.

disableLevelInput.name: Disable Level Input
disableLevelInput.hint: If enabled, the default level input on the character sheet will be disabled to encourage the use of the Level-Up Wizard for leveling up. This setting has no effect if the 'Enable Level-Up Button' setting is disabled.

sendGMWhispers.name: Send Manual Update Whispers to GM
sendGMWhispers.hint: When enabled, whispers about required manual updates (such as ability score increases or spell updates) will also be sent to the GM in addition to the player.
